scripts.db:inspect:tables: node ./scripts/wrangler-versioned.mjs d1 execute DB --env dev --command "SELECT name FROM sqlite_master WHERE type='table';"
scripts.db:migrate: pnpm run sync:api-version && node ./scripts/wrangler-versioned.mjs d1 migrations apply DB
scripts.db:migrate:local: node ./scripts/wrangler-versioned.mjs d1 migrations apply DB --env dev
scripts.dev:clean: pnpm run clean && pnpm run dev
scripts.install:clean: pnpm run clean && node -e "try{require('fs').rmSync(require('path').join(process.cwd(),'node_modules'),{recursive:true,force:true})}catch(_){}" && pnpm i
